short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checks for specific keywords in Adobe Stock assets and highlights them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly streamline your Adobe Stock portfolio management with the Portfolio Keyword Checker. This powerful extension helps you identify and manage keywords in your assets, ensuring your portfolio is always optimized and error-free.

Features:

Quickly search for specific keywords across your Adobe Stock assets.
Highlight invalid or unwanted keywords with ease.
Automate keyword removal to save time and ensure accuracy.
Supports both English and Thai languages for enhanced usability.
Intuitive and user-friendly interface with customizable options like "Auto Next Page."
Why Use Portfolio Keyword Checker? Managing keywords is crucial for visibility and discoverability on Adobe Stock. This tool simplifies the process, reducing manual effort and ensuring your portfolio stands out to potential clients.

Perfect for photographers, designers, and content creators who want to boost their portfolio's efficiency and quality.
